actionButtonNames.revert_description: Local undo on the selected tokens. Restores them to the source text.
actionButtonNames.auto_description: Makes the selected tokens stop being manually linked and falls back to the automatic aligner.
actionButtonNames.orphan_description: Makes each of the selected tokens be orphaned: only linked to themselves.
actionButtonNames.group_description: Makes a group of the selected words. (Any words they in turn are connected that are not selected will not be part of the group.)
actionButtonNames.next_mod_description: Select the next group which has modifications
actionButtonNames.prev_mod_description: Select the previous group which has modifications

options.fit_graph_description: adjust the height of the graph view
options.show_full_graph_description: render the full graph (may be slow, please have patience)
